title: Ashura Day
text: DESC: • It's 4 rakah salah, prayed with 2 rakah at a time.
DESC: • Pray anytime between Fajr and Dhuhr
DESC: • In 1st rakah, Recite [Súra al-Hamd](Quran:1) and then recite [Súra al-Káfirún](Quran:109)
DESC: • In 2nd rakah, Recite [Súra al-Hamd](Quran:1) and then recite [Súra al-Ikhlás](Quran:112)
DESC: • In 1st rakah, Recite [Súra al-Hamd](Quran:1) and then recite [Súra al-Ahzáb](Quran:33)
DESC: • In 2nd rakah, Recite [Súra al-Hamd](Quran:1) and then recite [Súra al-Munáfiqún](Quran:63)
